basics.name: Tony Nguyen
basics.label: Senior ReactJS Engineer
basics.summary: Experienced Senior ReactJS Engineer with a passion for building scalable, high-performance web applications. Expert in the React ecosystem, Next.js, and modern TypeScript patterns. Dedicated to clean code, user-centric design, and continuous learning.

projects.name: E-Commerce Dashboard
projects.description: A comprehensive dashboard for managing products, orders, and analytics. Built with Next.js App Router and Shadcn UI.

projects.name: SaaS Starter Kit
projects.description: An opinionated starter kit for building SaaS applications with authentication, billing, and multi-tenancy support.

projects.name: AI Content Generator
projects.description: A tool leveraging OpenAI's API to help users generate marketing copy and blog posts efficiently.
